p: The yield of cell harvested for purification of the catalytic domain of SARS-CoV 3CLpro was 2.69 g per 1000 ml of E. coli culture. The amount of purified protein synthesised with no-tag was 16 mg. For storage and assay, the protein solution was concentrated to 16 mg ml −1. The concentrated solution was diluted to 1 μM when the inhibitory assay was going on.
